titles.title: Now none but Christ can satisfy

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Christ, in Thee my soul hath found, And found in Thee alone, The peace, the joy I sought so long, The bliss till now unknown.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I tried the broken cisterns, Lord, But, ah, the waters failed! E’en as I stooped to drink they fled, And mocked me as I wailed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The pleasures lost I sadly mourned, But never wept for Thee, Till grace the sightless eyes received, Thy loveliness to see.{/lang-eng}
